author: Dave2D
description:
Stuff I Used in the Terminal:

- https://brew.sh
    - Lets you install programs from the terminal.
- https://ghostty.org
    - A *better* terminal emulator with support for True Colour, font ligatures, separate fonts for regular, italic, and symbols.
- https://yazi-rs.github.io
    - A terminal file manager.
- https://helix-editor.com
    - Similar to NeoVim but with no plug-ins, so it limits how much time you waste ricing your editor ;). 


If you'd like to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the “Join” button above!

title: The WEiRDEST Way to Use a Mac
